name: RedV-dramon
description: RedVeedramon is a bipedal reptilian Digimon with red eyes and covered mostly in red scales. It has five fingers on each hand, and three toes on each foot. It also has white fur on arms, mouth, and belly, except for red " V "-shaped fur on its chest. It also has one horn above its nose, and two horns on the back of its head, the later which form a "V"-shaped angle. RedVeedramon also has small " X "-shaped scarsâ€”one on its left thigh, and another on the right side of its mouth. It also a linear scar on each eyelid and its left leg.
